name: cbvalw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Change bound variable. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2017.)
